info.description: Backend Laravel Developer Challenge: API documentation for the News Aggregator

get.description: Fetches list of articles with optional filters for keyword, category, and source. Returns paginated results.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search in title and content

get.description: Fetch a specific article by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the article to fetch

Log out the authenticated user and revoke the access token.
